Articles.Content: Plz squad. This will revolutionize forums access on phones and devices other than computer. :DD
Well, often I'm on mobile and the website works fine for that.

48 minutes ago, TheGuyNamedAlan said:

Ksp forums app for mobile.

Sounds like a lot of work to re-invent the web-browser. Especially when that would be 3 apps, not one, just to cover the most common platforms.

Hasn't this been suggested before?

14 minutes ago, steve_v said:

...

Hasn't this been suggested before?

Several times. Each time leading to the same conclusion: not worth the effort.

I'm on mobile most of the time I'm in the forums, usually phone, often tablet. If I'm on PC I'm usually either supposed to be working/on lunchbreak or I'm at home playing KSP.

The editors etc could certainly be better, I find them quite frustrating at times, but I'm not sure it needs, or would benefit from, a separate 'Mobile' version. It just needs the 'mobile bits' of the current one sorting out better.  I have a shortcut on my home screen so I can access the forums directly, so even an app icon wouldn't benefit me anyway.
